column5: Relax and be pampered in l905 renovated home 1 block from historic sq. Perfect for getaways/ reunions/bus. conferences, etc. Rent entire 2nd floor with 2 kings and 2 twins, tv hospitality room w coffee/ microwave /frig. Screened porch off this room.
column8: Glen Rose 1905 Charmer blk from sq.
